document_data.mainbody:
ale Thorax Kulls was a giant spider from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
In the , Pale Thorax Kulls, along with other giant spiders, drow, and duergar, all were slaughtered in the home of Bloomridge Park groundskeeper, Lavernica. The murder spree was performed by Orin the Red and her Murder Tribunal of Bhaal. It left Kullss body scorched my magical flames.
